Key Match Events: Miles Bridges hit a game-tying 3 with 1.5 seconds left.
Coby White scored the first basket of Chicagoâ€™s 8-0 burst to begin overtime.
The Bulls scored 17 points in overtime, topping their 15-point first-quarter output.
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls defeat the host Charlotte Hornets 115-108, handing them their eighth straight loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls shot 37.5 percent from the field and made 18 of 60 attempts from deep.
Patrick Williams and Torrey Craig made up for Coby White's cold shooting by bagging five 3-pointers apiece.
Others: The Hornets played without team scoring leaders LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller.
